/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of gray and black, are adorned with vibrant red and yellow signs, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. Cars and motorcycles, parked haphazardly along the sides of the street, hint at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
